item.title: How can I check my GOTRAX order status?
item.dc:creator: The Firm Web
item.description:
Order status questions? Piece of crater cake! The GOTRAX.com website and store was designed specifically for you, our customers! Login […]

The post How can I check my GOTRAX order status? appeared first on GOTRAX.
item.content:encoded:
Order status questions? Piece of crater cake!

The GOTRAX.com website and store was designed specifically for you, our customers!

Login to “my account” at GOTRAX.com/my-account to find all information related to your order history including the status of your order as well as handy links to warranty information, shipping information, and more. 

If you purchased from the GOTRAX Amazon store, simply login to your Amazon account and head over to your order history to find details on your GOTRAX Amazon order.

We tried to make the experience of purchasing electric rideables from GOTRAX a pleasant experience from start to finish, but if you do happen to have any troubles, we’re here to help! Our support team is always ready and happy to assist.

The post How can I check my GOTRAX order status? appeared first on GOTRAX.

item.title: How long will it take for my GOTRAX order to be delivered?
item.dc:creator: The Firm Web
item.description:
The GOTRAX team is just as excited to see new Commanders jet around as you are! That’s why we try […]

The post How long will it take for my GOTRAX order to be delivered? appeared first on GOTRAX.
item.content:encoded:
The GOTRAX team is just as excited to see new Commanders jet around as you are! That’s why we try to get all our Commander’s e-rideables delivered quickly!

After your GOTRAX spacecraft is shipped, you can expect it to arrive within about five business days. We’ll also provide you with a tracking number so you can see its progress as our space couriers ship it from our Command Center, across the GOTRAX GALAXY, to your home base.

The post How long will it take for my GOTRAX order to be delivered? appeared first on GOTRAX.

item.title: How long before my GOTRAX order will be shipped?
item.dc:creator: The Firm Web
item.description:
When it comes to our mission of recruiting more Commanders, GOTRAX is committed to efficient onboarding and getting your GOTRAX […]

The post How long before my GOTRAX order will be shipped? appeared first on GOTRAX.
item.content:encoded:
When it comes to our mission of recruiting more Commanders, GOTRAX is committed to efficient onboarding and getting your GOTRAX order shipped as quickly as possible.

If a new Citizen of the GOTRAX GALAXY orders a HOVERFLY Eco or other electric rideable before 3 p.m. CST Monday through Friday during regular business hours, it will be shipped the same day. If ordered after 3 p.m. CST, it will be shipped the next business day, excluding weekends and public holidays like Labor Day or Christmas.

The post How long before my GOTRAX order will be shipped? appeared first on GOTRAX.
